basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Kristi Archuleta Endowed Scholarship in Organizational Leadership
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Dr. Kristi Archuleta Endowed Scholarship
basic_information.college_name: College of Education and Professional Studies

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education & Professional Studies majoring in Organizational Leadership. Eligibility Requirements This scholarship is open to an undergraduate student pursuing a degree in Organizational Leadership Minimum 3.3 GPA (UCO Overall GPA) Demonstrates financial need Submit (2) faculty recommendation letters Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
